summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transaction activities for the period of October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017. It includes information on debits, credits, and service charges, as well as instructions for addressing errors in the statement.

keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for October 2017.
The ending balance as of October 31, 2017, was $589,725.42.
There were multiple preauthorized debits for payroll and other fees during the month.
A payment of $6,422.09 was made to Morgan Haddon and Foreman, P.C.
The document includes instructions for addressing errors in the account statement.
